version_description: - fast video loading without compression.
- Improvement

- New video filters
- Add feedback and support section
- Improvements

- Fixed a bug with flipping the video from portrait to panoramic. We apologize for the inconvenience.
Thanks for the feedback.

- WhatsApp and Facebook stories support.
- Bug fixes.
- bug fixes
- bug fixes

- music library list fixes and improvements
- new media picker

- Bug fixes.
We apologise for the inconvenience. Thanks for the feedback.
- Bug fixes.

- Attention!!! If you have only Apple Music on your phone, DO NOT buy the "Music" extension, because Apple does not authorize the use rented music! Only purchased ones!!!
- fixes restore purchases
- bug fixes
- bug fixes (black screen when used video in boomerang or hyperlapse app, crash when export many photos)

- few improvements
- For technical problems, please contact us either through the application or via Telegram-bot http://t.me/cutstory_bot

- optimised for iPhone X.
- fixed a bug with black video.

- Bug fixes
